abilities.name: Grand Illusion
abilities.rule: If your army includes this model, after both players have deployed their armies, select up to three **NECRONS** units from your army and redeploy them. When doing so, you can set those units up in Strategic Reserves if you wish, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves.

abilities.name: Necrodermis
abilities.rule: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, halve the Damage characteristic of that attack.
